title: Disney Store Official Pluto Small Soft Toy, 25cm/9”, Iconic Cuddly Toy Character, Features a Characterful Expression and Collar with Wording, Suitable for All Ages
features: Iconic Companion: This Disney Store Official Pluto Small Soft Toy with a characterful expression and ‘If found, please return to Mickey Mouse’ collar is a timeless cuddly toy for all ages.
Embrace Nostalgia: Cherish warm memories with Pluto, Mickey's loyal pal, crafted into a 25cm super soft fabric plush toy, perfect for hugs and adventures.
Disney Charm: Bring home the magic with this adorable Pluto stuffed animal, featuring high-quality embroidered details that capture his playful spirit.
Perfect Playmate: Pluto is not just a Disney teddy; he’s a ready-to-love plush toy that will become a treasured friend for your little ones, encouraging imaginative play.
An Official Disney Treasure: This genuine Disney plush ensures you’re getting a piece of the magic, direct from the Disney Store, for a gift filled with joy and authenticity.
description: Product Description Explore our range of Disney plush including Stitch, Mickey Mouse, Olaf and more: Dive into a world of enchantment with our Disney Store soft toys!
